title: 235: Chat About Matt + Meghan & Harry’s Interview + Chris Harrison’s Apology w/ 2 Black Girls, 1 Rose!
itunes:title: 235: Chat About Matt + Meghan & Harry’s Interview + Chris Harrison’s Apology w/ 2 Black Girls, 1 Rose!
description:
The Broads are joined by two of their favorite ladies, Justine and Natasha - hosts of “2 Black Girls, 1 Rose” podcast, to have a chat about all things Bachelor Nation - Matt’s season, fave/least fave contestants, Chris Harrison’s apology, Rachel Lindsay’s departure, Pilot Pete showing up everywhere, potential Bachelorettes, and more! And of course, they also had to discuss Meghan and Harry’s interview with Oprah, some Real Housewife thoughts, and Rupaul’s Drag Race recent Snatch Game opinions! 

2 BLACK GIRLS, 1 ROSE:

Follow here: @2blackgirls1rose

Join their Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/2blackgirls1rose

Rate their amazing podcast 5 stars here:

 https://podcasts.apple.com/us/podcast/2-black-girls-1-rose-a-bachelor-podcast/id1327196317

THANKS TO OUR SPONSORS:

***KIWI CO: Get 30% off your first month plus FREE shipping on ANY crate line with code CHATTY at KIWICO.COM

***TALKSPACES: Use the code CHATTY to get $100 off your first month at TALKSPACE.COM

***STAMPS.COM:  Get a 4-week trial PLUS free postage and a digital scale at STAMPS.COM - click on the microphone at the top of the homepage and type in CHATTY

***UPSTART: Find out how Upstart can lower your monthly payments today when you go to UPSTART.COM/CHATTY

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
